name: The Medicine Man
description:
Made for the UoL summer game jam 2021 in 48 hours.

You are a doctor treating the peasantry, unfortunately the peasants aren't very smart and keep giving you vague descriptions of their symptoms. Thankfully, youre expertise as a doctor means you know how to treat them anyway! (Or at least get more research material out of it).

INSTRUCTIONS:
Press Symptoms to hear the patients symptoms from them, they might not describe all their symptoms so you have to be careful what you take from it.
Click on the book on the right side of your table to bring up a list of ingredients and illnesses to decide on cures. Some medicines require specific combinations to get the necessary effect.
Click on each ingredient on the table to be shown 2 buttons for preparation, Crush(raw) and powdered.
Once you have what you think is the cure, click on the mixing pot and select the hand to serve it. Then press the serve button on the new medicine pot.

The timer currently serves no purpose, it was originally going to be used to have multiple days and buy stock between days, but this was not doable in the time frame.
